snippet: After the bodies of three men were found inside a BMW, the police said they thought the victims were dealers who had stolen drugs from rivals.
abstract: Bodies of three men found inside a BMW near the Columbia University campus in Upper Manhattan are thought to be drug dealers who had stolen drugs from rivals and were victims of revenge killings.
lead_paragraph: After the bodies of three men were found inside a BMW, the police said they thought the victims were dealers who had stolen drugs from rivals.

headline.seo: Drug Link Is Eyed in Killings Near Columbia University
headline.main: Drug Link Is Suspected in Triple-Killing Near Columbia University
headline.print_headline: Drug Link Is Suspected In 3 Killings Near Campus
